text1:
This is a piece of work created with reference to YouTube videos.
It's a website where users input Japanese text to be translated into English by an AI,
with the aim of expanding the range of English expressions based on that translation.
I wanted to create it to gain experience with data exchange with APIs and backend processing.
techUsed: techUsed: Next.js, microCMS, prisma, planetScale, zod, openAIapi, tailwind, shadcn, typescript, etc
caution: â€» Due to the discontinuation of the planetScale hobby plan, it is currently suspended.
